channel.title: Need sprites help
channel.description:
I'm not sure if this is in the right section or not, but well i've been working on my sources sprites, recolouring, and adding logo's etc. And it looks great but i don't know how to change the scroll bar! :(
I don't have the file in my sprites folder. Can anyone help?
